frame.name: CeloRemit
frame.subtitle: AI-Powered Cross-Border Payments
frame.description: Send money globally using natural language with 15 Mento stablecoins. Say 'Send $50 to my mom in Philippines' and we handle the rest. Instant, low-fee remittances across Africa, Asia, Americas, and Europe.
frame.tagline: Send money globally with AI in seconds
frame.ogDescription: The easiest way to send money across borders. Natural language remittances with 15 Mento stablecoins. Fees under 1%, instant settlement.
